description: Enhanced MITRE ATT&CK queries for Logan Security Dashboard

queries.name: MITRE Sysmon Technique Overview
queries.query: 'Log Source' = 'Windows Sysmon Events' and 'User' != 'NT AUTHORITY\\SYSTEM' and 'Technique_id' is not null | timestats count as logrecords by 'Technique_id' | sort -logrecords
queries.description: Primary query to extract all MITRE ATT&CK technique IDs from Windows Sysmon events with event counts. Excludes system account events.

queries.name: Credential Access Techniques
queries.query: 'Log Source' = 'Windows Sysmon Events' and 'User' != 'NT AUTHORITY\\SYSTEM' and ('Technique_id' like 'T1003*' or 'Technique_id' like 'T1110*' or 'Technique_id' like 'T1555*' or 'Technique_id' like 'T1212*') | timestats count as events by 'Technique_id', 'User' | sort -events
queries.description: Focuses on credential access techniques (T1003, T1110, T1555, T1212) with user context.

queries.name: Execution Techniques
queries.query: 'Log Source' = 'Windows Sysmon Events' and 'User' != 'NT AUTHORITY\\SYSTEM' and ('Technique_id' like 'T1059*' or 'Technique_id' like 'T1203*' or 'Technique_id' like 'T1204*' or 'Technique_id' like 'T1047*') | timestats count as events by 'Technique_id', 'Process Name' | sort -events
queries.description: Identifies execution techniques (T1059, T1203, T1204, T1047) with process context.

queries.name: Persistence Techniques
queries.query: 'Log Source' = 'Windows Sysmon Events' and 'User' != 'NT AUTHORITY\\SYSTEM' and ('Technique_id' like 'T1053*' or 'Technique_id' like 'T1078*' or 'Technique_id' like 'T1547*' or 'Technique_id' like 'T1543*') | timestats count as events by 'Technique_id', 'Host Name' | sort -events
queries.description: Tracks persistence techniques (T1053, T1078, T1547, T1543) with host context.

queries.name: Privilege Escalation Techniques
queries.query: 'Log Source' = 'Windows Sysmon Events' and 'User' != 'NT AUTHORITY\\SYSTEM' and ('Technique_id' like 'T1548*' or 'Technique_id' like 'T1055*' or 'Technique_id' like 'T1134*' or 'Technique_id' like 'T1068*') | timestats count as events by 'Technique_id', 'User', 'Process Name' | sort -events
queries.description: Monitors privilege escalation techniques (T1548, T1055, T1134, T1068) with user and process context.

queries.name: Defense Evasion Techniques
queries.query: 'Log Source' = 'Windows Sysmon Events' and 'User' != 'NT AUTHORITY\\SYSTEM' and ('Technique_id' like 'T1055*' or 'Technique_id' like 'T1112*' or 'Technique_id' like 'T1027*' or 'Technique_id' like 'T1140*') | timestats count as events by 'Technique_id', 'Event ID' | sort -events
queries.description: Detects defense evasion techniques (T1055, T1112, T1027, T1140) with event ID context.

queries.name: Discovery Techniques
queries.query: 'Log Source' = 'Windows Sysmon Events' and 'User' != 'NT AUTHORITY\\SYSTEM' and ('Technique_id' like 'T1082*' or 'Technique_id' like 'T1083*' or 'Technique_id' like 'T1087*' or 'Technique_id' like 'T1046*') | timestats count as events by 'Technique_id', 'Command Line' | sort -events
queries.description: Identifies discovery techniques (T1082, T1083, T1087, T1046) with command line context.

queries.name: Lateral Movement Techniques
queries.query: 'Log Source' = 'Windows Sysmon Events' and 'User' != 'NT AUTHORITY\\SYSTEM' and ('Technique_id' like 'T1021*' or 'Technique_id' like 'T1570*' or 'Technique_id' like 'T1550*') | timestats count as events by 'Technique_id', 'Source IP', 'Destination IP' | sort -events
queries.description: Tracks lateral movement techniques (T1021, T1570, T1550) with network context.

queries.name: Command and Control Techniques
queries.query: 'Log Source' = 'Windows Sysmon Events' and 'User' != 'NT AUTHORITY\\SYSTEM' and ('Technique_id' like 'T1071*' or 'Technique_id' like 'T1090*' or 'Technique_id' like 'T1095*' or 'Technique_id' like 'T1573*') | timestats count as events by 'Technique_id', 'Destination IP', 'Destination Port' | sort -events
queries.description: Monitors command and control techniques (T1071, T1090, T1095, T1573) with network details.

queries.name: MITRE Technique Timeline
queries.query: 'Log Source' = 'Windows Sysmon Events' and 'User' != 'NT AUTHORITY\\SYSTEM' and 'Technique_id' is not null | link span=1hour Time | stats count as events by Time, 'Technique_id' | sort Time
queries.description: Creates a timeline of MITRE technique activity over time with 1-hour intervals.

queries.name: High Severity MITRE Techniques
queries.query: 'Log Source' = 'Windows Sysmon Events' and 'User' != 'NT AUTHORITY\\SYSTEM' and 'Technique_id' is not null | timestats count as events by 'Technique_id' | where events >= 50 | sort -events
queries.description: Identifies high-volume MITRE techniques (50+ events) indicating potential threat activity.

queries.name: User-Technique Correlation
queries.query: 'Log Source' = 'Windows Sysmon Events' and 'User' != 'NT AUTHORITY\\SYSTEM' and 'Technique_id' is not null | stats count as events, dc('Technique_id') as unique_techniques by 'User' | where unique_techniques >= 5 | sort -unique_techniques
queries.description: Correlates users with multiple MITRE techniques to identify potential compromised accounts.
